message:
SYSTEM: OpenScienceOEG_Grupo_20161110.pdf: Página 28
Open Science
Is it that simple? 
• No…
• You need
• Documentation for annotators
• Measurable targets
• What are the annotations going to be used for? 
• How are you going to control the process? 
• Crowd vs no crowd? 
• A crowd of one?
speaker: SYSTEM
